challenges.title: Person Object (Name and Age)
challenges.description: Read a name and an age, create an object with these values and print: Name is <name> and age is <age>
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (single word). Second line: age (integer).
challenges.outputDescription: Single line: Name is <name> and age is <age>
examples:
Input:
Ram
20

Output:
Name is Ram and age is 20

tests.expected: Name is Ram and age is 20
Name is Teja and age is 19

challenges.title: Student Total Marks (Object)
challenges.description: Read a student's name and three subject marks. Store them in an object and print: <name> <total>
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (single word). Second line: three integers m1 m2 m3.
challenges.outputDescription: Single line: name followed by total marks.
